description: This file implements serialization and conversion functions for various data types, including string conversions, hex encoding/decoding, base64 encoding, and Unicode code point handling. It contains utility functions for string manipulation, character encoding, and binary data transformations.

methods.name: ToString (wchar_t[], std::string&)
methods.description: Converts wide character string to UTF-8 string.

methods.name: ToString (char[], std::wstring&)
methods.description: Converts multi-byte string to wide string.

methods.name: ToString (wchar_t[], unsigned int)
methods.description: Converts wide wchar_t array to std::string considering Unicode settings.

methods.name: ToString (char[], unsigned int)
methods.description: Converts char array to std::string considering Unicode settings.

methods.name: void EXTERNAL ToHexString(const uint8_t object[],const uint16_t length,string & result)
methods.description: Encodes binary data into a hexadecimal string.

methods.name: uint16_t EXTERNAL FromHexString(const string & hexString,uint8_t * object,const uint16_t maxLength)
methods.description: Decodes a hexadecimal string into binary data.

methods.name: ToString (base64)
methods.description: Encodes binary data into a base64 string.

methods.name: FromString (base64)
methods.description: Decodes a base64 string into binary data.

methods.name: bool CodePointToUTF16(const uint32_t codePoint,uint16_t & lowPart,uint16_t & highPart)
methods.description: Converts a Unicode code point to UTF-16 surrogate pair components.

methods.name: bool UTF16ToCodePoint(const uint16_t lowPart,const uint16_t highPart,uint32_t & codePoint)
methods.description: Converts UTF-16 surrogate pair components back to a Unicode code point.

methods.name: int8_t ToCodePoint(const TCHAR * data,const uint8_t length,uint32_t & codePoint)
methods.description: Decodes a sequence of UTF-8 bytes into a Unicode code point.

methods.name: int8_t FromCodePoint(uint32_t codePoint,TCHAR * data,const uint8_t length)
methods.description: Encodes a Unicode code point into UTF-8 bytes.

methods.name: string EXTERNAL ToQuotedString(const TCHAR quote,const string & input)
methods.description: Returns a string with internal quotes escaped and wrapped in quotes.

methods.name: uint16_t FromString(const string & newValue,uint8_t object[],uint16_t & length,const TCHAR * ignoreList)
string ToString(const char realString[],unsigned int length)
string ToString(const wchar_t realString[],unsigned int length)
void ToString(const uint8_t object[],const uint16_t length,const bool padding,string & result)

ctags.name: CodePointToUTF16
ctags.pattern: /^    bool CodePointToUTF16(const uint32_t codePoint, uint16_t& lowPart, uint16_t& highPart) {$/

ctags.name: FromCodePoint
ctags.pattern: /^    int8_t FromCodePoint(uint32_t codePoint, TCHAR* data, const uint8_t length) {$/

ctags.name: FromHexString
ctags.pattern: /^    uint16_t EXTERNAL FromHexString(const string& hexString, uint8_t* object, const uint16_t max/

ctags.name: FromString
ctags.pattern: /^    uint16_t FromString(const string& newValue, uint8_t object[], uint16_t& length, const TCHAR*/
ctags.signature: (const string & newValue,uint8_t object[],uint16_t & length,const TCHAR * ignoreList)

ctags.name: ToCodePoint
ctags.pattern: /^    int8_t ToCodePoint(const TCHAR* data, const uint8_t length,  uint32_t& codePoint) {$/

ctags.name: ToHexString
ctags.pattern: /^    void EXTERNAL ToHexString(const uint8_t object[], const uint16_t length, string& result)$/

ctags.pattern: /^    string EXTERNAL ToQuotedString(const TCHAR quote, const string& input) {$/

ctags.pattern: /^    string ToString(const char realString[], unsigned int length)$/

ctags.name: ToString
ctags.pattern: /^    string ToString(const wchar_t realString[], unsigned int length)$/

ctags.name: ToString
ctags.pattern: /^    void ToString(const char realString[], std::wstring& result)$/

ctags.name: ToString
ctags.pattern: /^    void ToString(const uint8_t object[], const uint16_t length, const bool padding, string& res/
ctags.signature: (const uint8_t object[],const uint16_t length,const bool padding,string & result)

ctags.pattern: /^    bool UTF16ToCodePoint(const uint16_t lowPart, const uint16_t highPart, uint32_t& codePoint) /
